transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very easy to find. I came here because it was very close to Chaoyang Railway Station. After I came in, the service attitude of the hotel front desk was very good. The room was very clean. The waiters were very patient. There was also a robot that could deliver meals. It was a great experience.

Your satisfaction is the biggest motivation for our work. Hanting Chaoyang Railway Station has always provided the most sincere and enthusiastic service to bring every guest a home away from home experience. Your smile is our best reward. Thank you for your choice and look forward to it. See you again and wish you a happy life!
